title: Chavakachcheri railway station
text: Chavakachcheri railway station is a <a href="railway%20station">railway station</a> in the town of <a href="Chavakachcheri">Chavakachcheri</a> in northern <a href="Sri%20Lanka">Sri Lanka</a>. Owned by <a href="Sri%20Lanka%20Railways">Sri Lanka Railways</a>, the <a href="state-owned">state-owned</a> <a href="List%20of%20railway%20companies">railway operator</a>, the station is part of the <a href="Northern%20Line%20%28Sri%20Lanka%29">Northern Line</a> which links the <a href="Northern%20Province%2C%20Sri%20Lanka">north</a> with the capital <a href="Colombo">Colombo</a>. The popular <a href="Yarl%20Devi">Yarl Devi</a> service used to call at the station. The station has not been functioning since 1990 due to the <a href="Sri%20Lankan%20Civil%20War">civil war</a>.
